# Matrices
```{r}
   rA <- +(!A)
   Bp <- A %*% t(rA)
   Bg <- t(t(rA) %*% A)
   Dp <- diag(rowSums(A))
   Dg <- diag(colSums(A))
   rownames(Dp) <- rownames(A)
   colnames(Dp) <- rownames(A)
   rownames(Dg) <- colnames(A)
   rownames(Dg) <- colnames(A)
   Bp.n <- solve(Dp) %*% Bp
   Bg.n <- solve(Dg) %*% Bg
   CDp <- sort(rowSums(Bp.n))/nrow(A)
   CDg <- sort(rowSums(Bg.n))/ncol(A)
```
